original_text: Then they travelled to Gudgodah. From there they travelled to Jotbathah, a place where there are many streams of water.
korean_text: 또 거기를 떠나 굿고다에 이르고 굿고다를 떠나 욧바다에 이른즉 그 땅에는 시내가 많았으며

sentences.original_text: From there they travelled to Jotbathah
a place where there are many streams of water.
